activities.description: Developed comprehensive boot prompt document for OpenAI to initialize ECHO-AZ assistant with full ICA project knowledge
activities.outcome: Success - Created initialization instructions with all raw GitHub URLs and role definitions

key_decisions.decision: Structured boot prompt with clear initialization steps
key_decisions.rationale: OpenAI needs explicit instructions to load and process GitHub files correctly

key_decisions.decision: Included all raw GitHub URLs for direct access
key_decisions.rationale: OpenAI can read raw URLs but needs them explicitly provided
Christopher Kuhn needs business-level insights, not technical details

next_actions.action: Update boot prompt based on testing feedback

notes: Client can now share this single URL with OpenAI to initialize ECHO-AZ
Document includes all knowledge file URLs, role definitions, and interaction guidelines
